properties.entry: INSERT INTO REPLY(REPLY_NO, BOARD_NO, WRITER, CONTENT, IS_ANONIMOUS) VALUES (SEQ_RNO.NEXTVAL, ?, ?, ?, ?)

SELECT R.REPLY_NO, R.BOARD_NO, NICK_NAME AS WRITER, R.CONTENT, R.RECOMMEND_COUNT, R.REPORT_COUNT, R.ENROLL_DATE, R.IS_ANONIMOUS, P_REPLY_NO FROM REPLY R JOIN MEMBER ON (USER_NO = WRITER) WHERE BOARD_NO = ? ORDER BY ENROLL_DATE DESC, REPLY_NO DESC
UPDATE REPLY SET RECOMMEND_COUNT = RECOMMEND_COUNT + 1 WHERE REPLY_NO = ?
